Module that acts as an API for PB2 maps.

Types

Action = ref object
  opID*: int
  args*: seq[string]

Background = ref object of BaseMapObject
  w*, h*, texX*, texY*, layer*: int
  showShadow*: bool
  hexMultiplier*, material*: string
  attachTo*: Movable

Barrel = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  model*: string
  tox*, toy*: int

BaseMapObject = ref object of RootObj
  x*, y*: int

BaseNamedMapObject = ref object of BaseMapObject
  name*: string

Box = ref object of BaseMapObject
  w*, h*, material*: int

Character = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  isPlayer*: bool
  tox*, toy*: int
  hea*, hmax*: int
  team*: int
  side*, skin*: int
  botAction*: int
  onDeath*: Trigger
  incar*: Vehicle

Decoration = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  model*: string
  layer*: int
  texX*, texY*: int
  rotation*: int
  scaleX*, scaleY*: int
  attachTo*: Movable

EngineMark = ref object of BaseMapObject
  modifier*: EngineMarks
  parameter*: string

EngineMarks = enum
  CHANGE_SKY = "sky", SHADOW_MAP_SIZE = "shadowmap_size",
  CASUAL_MODE = "casual", NO_BASE_NOISE = "nobase", ALT_GAME = "game2",
  STRICT_CASUAL_MODE = "strict_casual", NO_AUTO_REVIVE = "no_auto_revive",
  FORCE_RAGDOLL_DISAPPEARMENT = "meat", MARINE_WEAPONS = "hero1_guns",
  PROXY_WEAPONS = "hero2_guns", PROXY_WEAPONS_NO_NADE = "hero2_guns_nonades",
  PROXY_WEAPONS_ONLY_NADES = "hero2_guns_nades", NO_PSI = "nopsi",
  GAME_SCALE = "gamescale", HE_NADES_COUNT = "he_nades_count",
  PORT_NADES_COUNT = "port_nades_count", SH_NADES_COUNT = "sh_nades_count",
  SNOW = "snow", WATER_COLOR = "watercolor", ACID_COLOR = "acidcolor",
  WATER_TITLE = "watertitle", ACIDT_ITLE = "acidtitle",
  SLOTS_ON_SPAWN = "dm_slots_on_spawn",
  MAX_GUNS_ON_SPAWN = "dm_max_guns_on_spawn",
  TRIGGER_ERROR_REPORTING = "level_errors", VAR_SYNC_ACTIONS = "var_sync",
  NO_LIGHT_BREAK = "no_light_break",
  NAIVE_HIT_CONFIRMATION = "naive_hit_confirmation"
Lamp = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  power*: float
  hasFlare*: bool

Map = ref object
  triggers*: seq[Trigger]
  timers*: seq[Timer]
  characters*: seq[Character]
  movables*: seq[Movable]
  decorations*: seq[Decoration]
  regions*: seq[Region]
  songs*: seq[Song]
  lamps*: seq[Lamp]
  barrels*: seq[Barrel]
  weapons*: seq[Weapon]
  pushers*: seq[Pusher]
  vehicles*: seq[Vehicle]
  waters*: seq[Water]
  boxes*: seq[Box]
  engineMarks*: seq[EngineMark]
  backgrounds*: seq[Background]
Object that holds everything. 
Movable = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  w*, h*, speed*, tarx*, tary*: int
  visible*, moving*: bool
  attachTo*: Movable

PBVar = distinct string
Pusher = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  w*, h*, tox*, toy*, stabilityDamage*, damage*: int
  attachTo*: Movable

Region = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  w*, h*: int
  actTrigger*: Trigger
  actOn*: RegionActivation
  attachTo*: Movable

RegionActivation = enum
  NOTHING = -1, BUTTON = 1, BY_CHAR_NOT_IN_VEHICLE, BY_CHAR_IN_VEHICLE, BY_CHAR,
  BY_MOVABLE, BY_PLAYER, BY_ALL_HERO, INVISIBLE_BUTTON, RED_BUTTON, BLUE_BUTTON,
  INVISIBLE_RED_BUTTON, INVISIBLE_BLUE_BUTTON, BY_RED_PLAYER, BY_BLUE_PLAYER,
  INVISIBLE_BUTTON_WITHOUT_SOUND
Song = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  url*: string
  volume*: int
  loop*: bool
  onEnd*: Trigger

Timer = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  enabled*: bool
  callback*: Trigger
  delay*, maxCalls*: int

Trigger = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  implicitSplitting*: bool
  enabled*: bool
  maxCalls*: int
  actions*: seq[Action]

Vehicle = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  side*, tox*, toy*, hpPercent*: int
  model*: string

Water = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  w*, h*, damage*: int
  friction*: bool

Weapon = ref object of BaseNamedMapObject
  model*: string
  team*, level*: int

Lets

DO_NOTHING = Action(opID: -1, args: @[])

Consts

CIVIL_SECURITY = "4"
EXOS = "0"
HERO = "1"
NOIR_LIME = "2"
PROXY = "3"

Procs

proc `$`(pbvar: PBVar): string {.borrow, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Gives name of pbvar. 
proc addAction(trigger: Trigger; action: Action) {.inline, discardable,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Adds action to trigger.actions 
proc addAction(trigger: Trigger; opID: int; args: seq[string]): Action {.
    discardable, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Makes action with opID and args and then adds it to trigger.actions 
proc dump(barrel: Barrel): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Dumps barrel.

Dumps background. 
proc dump(box: Box): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Dumps wall.

Dumps character.

Dumps decoration.

Dumps engine mark.

Dumps lamp. 
proc dump(map: Map): string {....raises: [LibraryError, Exception],
                              tags: [RootEffect], forbids: [].}
Dumps every single object the map holds. 
proc dump(movable: Movable): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Dumps movable. 
proc dump(pusher: Pusher): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Dumps pusher. 
proc dump(region: Region): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Dumps region. 
proc dump(song: Song): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Dumps song. 
proc dump(timer: Timer): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Dumps timer. 
proc dump(trigger: Trigger): string {....raises: [LibraryError, Exception],
                                      tags: [RootEffect], forbids: [].}
Dumps trigger. The output will be either 1 trigger or 2+ trigger depending on actions the trigger holds. 
proc dump(vehicle: Vehicle): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Dumps vehicle. 
proc dump(water: Water): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Dumps water. 
proc dump(weapon: Weapon): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Dumps weapon. 
proc newBackground(map: Map; x, y, w, h, texX, texY, layer = 0; material = "0";
                   hexMultiplier = ""; showShadow = true;
                   attachTo: Movable = nil): Background {.discardable,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new background. 
proc newBarrel(map: Map; name: string; x, y, tox, toy = 0; model = "bar_orange"): Barrel {.
    discardable, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new barrel. 
proc newBox(map: Map; x, y, w, h, material = 0): Box {.discardable, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new wall. 
proc newCharacter(map: Map; name: string; x, y, tox, toy = 0; hea, hmax = 130;
                  team = 0; side = 1; skin = -1; incar: Vehicle = nil;
                  botAction = 4; onDeath: Trigger = nil; isPlayer = true): Character {.
    discardable, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new character. 
proc newDecoration(map: Map; name: string;
                   x, y, texX, texY, rotation, layer = 0; scaleX, scaleY = 1;
                   model = "stone"; attachTo: Movable = nil): Decoration {.
    discardable, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new decoration. 
proc newEngineMark(map: Map; x, y = 0; modifier = EngineMarks.MARINE_WEAPONS;
                   parameter = "0"): EngineMark {.discardable, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new engine mark. 
proc newLamp(map: Map; name: string; x, y = 0; power = 0.4; hasFlare = true): Lamp {.
    discardable, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new lamp. 
proc newMap(): Map {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new map object which you use to create objects. 
proc newMovable(map: Map; name: string; x, y, w, h, tarx, tary = 0; speed = 10;
                visible = true; moving = false; attachTo: Movable = nil): Movable {.
    discardable, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new movable. 
proc newPusher(map: Map; name: string;
               x, y, tox, toy, stabilityDamage, damage = 0;
               attachTo: Movable = nil): Pusher {.discardable, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new pusher. 
proc newRegion(map: Map; name: string; x, y, w, h = 0;
               actTrigger: Trigger = nil; actOn = NOTHING;
               attachTo: Movable = nil): Region {.discardable, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new region. 
proc newSong(map: Map; name: string; x, y = 0; url = ""; volume = 1;
             loop = true; onEnd: Trigger = nil): Song {.discardable, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new song. 
proc newTimer(map: Map; name: string; x, y = 0; enabled = true;
              callback: Trigger = nil; maxCalls = 1; delay = 30): Timer {.
    discardable, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new timer. 
proc newTrigger(map: Map; name: string; x, y = 0; enabled = true; maxCalls = 1;
                actions: seq[Action] = @[]; implicitSplitting = true): Trigger {.
    discardable, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new trigger.

    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}

    forbids: [].}
Creates new vehicle.

    discardable, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Creates new water.

    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
